title: Is TikTok's new EduTok program a scam or can I really make money on it by creating educational videos? - Quora

response.answer_text: creating educational videos is a challenge, because study content does’nt get viral as compared to entertainment. So if you love challenges then best of luck for Friend you can do it and one tip if you really want to make money then by creating videos then start with YouTube Then slowly switch to the udemy platform to earn a really good money.
